message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.  I think you'll be very happy with this purchase!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can't pay more than $12,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price accordingly?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is closer to the product's true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I still believe I can only pay up to $12,000. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between these two prices?
